comments_since_last_sample.body: I want music that challenges me.  Fuck your safety nets and "tried and true" methods, I want something new and different.

When I am blown away by it. That empowering tingly feeling you get when you hear some thing, and/or see a musician that is in a class of their own. More recently I ran across Flakor by this band called Covet. The way she plays is amazing. Like jaw dropping. I was an instant fan.
That would vary so much from person to person.
It has to sound pleasant to my ear holes. Only requirement.
